methods.name: public Builder setApplyStrategy(@TextLinks.ApplyStrategy int applyStrategy)
methods.comment:
* Sets the apply strategy used to determine how to apply links to text.
         *      e.g {@link TextLinks#APPLY_STRATEGY_IGNORE}
         *
         * @return this builder

methods.name: public Builder setSpanFactory(@Nullable Function<TextLink, TextLinkSpan> spanFactory)
methods.comment:
* Sets a custom span factory for converting TextLinks to TextLinkSpans.
         * Set to {@code null} to use the default span factory.
         *
         * @return this builder

methods.name: public Builder setEntityConfig(@Nullable TextClassifier.EntityConfig entityConfig)
methods.comment:
* Sets the entity configuration used to determine what entity types to generate.
         * Set to {@code null} for the default entity config which will automatically determine
         * what links to generate.
         *
         * @return this builder

methods.name: public TextLinksParams build()
methods.comment: * Builds and returns a TextLinksParams object.

methodNames: public Builder setSpanFactory(@Nullable Function<TextLink, TextLinkSpan> spanFactory)
